snippet: Two players in the National Football League, Brendon Ayanbadejo and Chris Kluwe, have lent their support for gay marriage, helping alter the league’s stigma of having a homophobic culture.
abstract: Two players in the National Football League--Baltimore Ravens linebacker Brendon Ayanbadejo and Minnesota Vikings punter Chris Kluwe--are lending their support for gay marriage, helping alter the league’s stigma of having a homophobic culture.
